ing: 3 cups lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage, chilled
des: "This recipe is a good way to use up seasonal fruit and it's also a great summer snack!"
ins: Toss together the cantaloupe, honeydew, watermelon, apple, banana, and mango in a large bowl.  Divide the fruit into six paper cups.  Pour 1/2 cup of lemon-lime soda into each cup.  Place in the freezer for 5 minutes, then serve.
